title: ISic000547. I.Sicily inscription 000547
body:
Facsimile Images

d(is) m(anibus)
[A]ur(elio) ((·)) Rustico ((·)) mil(itavit)
ann(os) ((·)) VIII tr(iere) (centuria) Zeno-
nis ((·)) Mar(cus) ((·)) Germanici-
5anus ((·)) mil(itavit) ((·)) ann(os) ((·)) X
Valer(ius) ((·)) Victorinus
her(es) ((·)) b(ene) ((·)) m(erenti) ((·)) f(ecit)

Apparatus criticus

Text of CIL

English translation

To the spirits of the Underworld. Valerius Victorinus, the heir, made this for the well-deserving Aurelius Rusticus, who served for eight years in the century aboard the trireme Zenon, (and for) Marcus Germanicianus, who served for ten years.

commentary

bibliography

    10.7288 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589 Manganaro 1988 41 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001427
